comments.raw_text:
I get some crazy overlapping of text, which I *think* is incorrect, but could be right.

Chrome: http://jouire.com/screens/24/3154a055c0www.png
Nightly: http://cl.ly/3y380q1P17173K3F2D30

I don't think there's anything really "wrong" there... looks to me like lengthy strings of assorted combining diacritics, in which case stacking them above and below the relevant base characters seems like a reasonable effort at displaying them.
